transcript:
Customer: Bhai saadi kab hori?
Halo. 
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes. Yahape Vishal ji bol rahe from IndiaMART.
Executive: Ha ji Vishal ji boliye. Good afternoon. Aapka koi concern tha aapne kara tha.
Customer: Ha wo maine actually kiya tha na wo ek email id add kar raha tha aur baar baar jo mobile pe OTP aa raha tha na OTP wo sahi sahi dalne ke bawajud wo acceptance nahi le raha tha. To somehow fir maine usse re-login karke restart proper re-login tab jake kiya fir jake usne accept kiya. Kyunki ab ye IndiaMART ka access mere hath se jake Chinese handle karenge. Thik hai, head office hai. Isiliye main us wo handover de raha tha unko.
Executive: Thik hai. Accha. To isliye jo hamare paas. Accha accha to wo ho gaya sir resolve aapka?
Customer: Kya ji?
Executive: Resolve ho gaya sir wo OTP clear ho gaya aapka email se related wagera?
Customer: Ha ho gaya ho gaya sir ho gaya sir ho gaya.
Executive: To sir actually hamare paas ek ticket open tha aapke company ke regarding. Main usi wohi discuss karna chah raha tha aapse.
Customer: Kis chiz?
Executive: Sir jo hamare paas aapki categories promote ho rahi hai na IndiaMART pe. 
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ji to sir sari categories mein abhi lead pick nahi kara hai humne abhi recently kuch categories rank mein badal chuke hain. Usme category ka naam tha ki sir unka ranking change ho gaya. Ranking in the sense unpe activity kam hai.
Customer: Sir lead genuine aa hi nahi rahi hai actually na market mein aisi baat nahi hai waise kya hai na isme IndiaMART fault nahi hai actually market se lead aa hi nahi rahi hai. 
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye chiz hai isliye thoda sa bad situation.
Executive: Bilkul chemical intermediate sabka polymer additive isme lead isme bhi lead nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi chemical intermediate to mujhe bilkul hatana hai. Ye mujhe relevant hi nahi hai.
Executive: Relevant hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir intermediate chemical mein jo apne paas data hai na jo aapko valid ka number hai wo har mahine sir constant raha hai. Aisa nahi hai ki sir usme kuch incline or decline hua ho data. 
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Har month jo jo option hai hamare paas 360 numbers bata raha hu main aapko. 360 ji sir 380 ye number reh raha hai sir har mahine.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Kisi mahine mein sir aisa nahi hai ki 200 bhi low gaya hua hai.
Customer: Ji bilkul isme sir I think. 
Executive: Haan ji sir. To isme specifically hum is category se leads wagera pick karte hain. To sir better tha ki hamara ye jo ranking kharab ho rahi hai wo better ho jati yaha pe.
Customer: Hmm samajh gaya sir. 
Executive: Right. To isme inquiries bhi aa rahe honge sir market se?
Customer: Nahi sir actually chemical intermediate is very little different. To thoda sa concern hai ki kaise batau main aapko ab ye chiz IndiaMART ki inquiry humne kuch din baad main aapse koi Chinese person baat karega very soon.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Main nahi karaunga number yahi rahega par kuch Chinese hi baat karega wo aapse via English. English mein hi karega ye chiz hai thoda sa concern. Accha to aapne waha account chala gaya. To aap mujhe sir abhi tak bata dena in future to mujhe unse baat karni hi hai. 
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To matlab isme kya aapko karna hai is do teen categories hai apne paas acetylin kya hai sir category ka naam dijiye second. Acetylin and lecithin accessory category apne paas. 
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur ek polymer additive ye hai. To isme sir kya raha feedback wagera leads wagera?
Customer: Nahi sir actually main wo pura revise karne ki planning mein actually hum logo ne us product band kar diye IndiaMART wala na. 
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To pura actually na company bilkul changing phase pe aa rahi hai December tak ho jayega pura. Isiliye aap dekhenge mere bhi aapse coordination nahi ho pa raha tha to mujhe pata tha ki ek din Chinese aayega fir apne hisab se customize karayega wo sir chhe din baad mein customize ho jayega chiz hai. To abhi apne paas kaun sa product hai available hai? Jo I think profile. 
Customer: Silane coupling agent. Silane coupling agent ye hamara top lead honi chahiye. Silane coupling agent aur antioxidant ye hamare top products hai. Ye band kabhi nahi honge.
Executive: Okay antioxidant bataya aapne sir. Aur cross linking agent na?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Silane coupling agent, silane.
Executive: Okay coupling agent taking a second. 
Executive: Right sir. Sir to isme ye category to already profile mein added hai. Abhi us category pe focus nahi kar paye like do char lead hi consume hai pichle chhe mahine mein sir. To isme in future aapko pata hai ki sir ye category hamara rehna hai hamesha hi rehna hai ya wholesaling categories hai to sir isko hum is tarah se. 
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: First of all to isko hum. 
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Uh sir actually main abhi shift off ho gayi hai. Actually thoda sa main nikal raha hu. Main aapko kal morning mein keh sakta hu. 
Executive: Sure sir main aapko morning mein ek video link share kar dunga but sir aap mujhe bas ye bata de ki main is direct kar paunga yaha pe. Jaise sir constructive additive karke hai. To isme ek hi product tha to wo bhi de rank matlab usme kya karna hai isme humen?
Customer: Sir pura ek format hoga sir main aapko bata to raha hu aap mujhe thoda time dijiye kyunki main abhi kal ka bhi sure nahi hu. Abhi chize handover ho rahi hai mere se sir. 
Executive: Sure sure sure sir aapne I think WhatsApp pe hame le rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan sir WhatsApp pe chalega. 
Executive: Thik hai WhatsApp pe hame de rahe hain isko discuss kar lete hain jabhi aap available ho. 
Customer: Okay sir okay. 
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues adding email ID, OTP not accepting.

- Categories rank has changed, activity is less.

- Genuine leads are not coming from the market.

- Wants to remove chemical intermediate category.

- Chinese person will handle account soon.



Resolution:

- OTP issue resolved by re-login.

- Executive explained about category ranking.

- Executive shared that data is constant every month.

- Executive will share a video link in the morning.



Next Steps: 

- Discuss on WhatsApp when available.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, leads, categories, ranking, handover
